meanings.definition: A person who spends money freely or extravagantly.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a big spender when it comes to buying gifts for others.
meanings.sent2: The group of spenders at the mall made the cashier's day with their purchases.
meanings.sent3: The spenders in the family always make sure everyone has the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she is known as the ultimate spender, always buying the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The spender's generosity knew no bounds, always treating friends to meals and gifts.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'spender', referring to multiple individuals who spend money freely or extravagantly.
meanings.sent1: At the charity auction, the spenders outbid each other to support a good cause.
meanings.sent2: The spenders in the group never hesitate to splurge on luxurious vacations.
meanings.sent3: During the holiday season, the spenders turned gift-giving into a competitive sport.
meanings.sent4: The spenders in the office were like a whirlwind of shopping, always bringing back new items.
meanings.sent5: In the world of collectors, the spenders were revered for their impressive acquisitions.
